title: Carole Baskin
summary: Carole Baskin (n√©e Carole Stairs Jones, formerly known as Carole Murdock; born June 6, 1961) is an American animal rights activist and CEO of Big Cat Rescue, a non-profit animal sanctuary based near Tampa, Florida.[1][2] She has garnered attention to the plight of captive big cats to local, national, and international media outlets.
